Package com.cubeia.firebase.api.game.activator

Interface Summary
ActivatorContext This is the context published towards the game activator from the platform.
CreationParticipant This is a participant interface for table creation.
GameActivator The game activator is responsible for table creation and maintenance in the Firebase cluster.
MttAwareActivator This interface should be implemented by activators which are aware of MTT code and wants to be notified on shared events such as table creation.
RequestAwareActivator Activators may want to support table creation requested by clients or other external sources, in which case this interface must be implemented.
RequestCreationParticipant This interface adds methods for invite-lists to the creation participant.
TableFactory This is the access interface published by the platform to game activators in order to enable them to query the current state of the system and manage the tables.
 

Class Summary
DefaultActivator This is the default implementation of a game activator used by Firebase if no other activator is found.
DefaultActivatorConfig This is a bean implementation of the default activator config file.
DefaultCreationParticipant This is the default table creator participant.
 

Exception Summary
CreationRequestDeniedException This exception should be thrown to indicate that a table request has been denied.
